author: A_Brickset_user
title: wow awesome set
review: you get this set, brickmaster magizine with deluxe cover previews for future sets and more.  The CD rocks. AND you get comics.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                AWESOME!

author: Com161
title: Ick, ick, ick!
review: The Brickmaster magazine is nice, but this set is something else. The included software is extremely prone to crashing and the pieces are nothing special. What's worst of all, you can't build anything worthwhile with the pieces. I mean, come on! Lego can do better than a multi-colored airplane. So, subscribing to Brickmaster is a bad idea, since you can get the magazine for free and you can buy the sets at a store.
